titles.title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to make certain improvements to the comprehensive service programs for homeless veterans.

bill.summary:
Allows homeless veterans' comprehensive services grant funds to be used to provide funding for service center staff.
Revises provisions concerning payments for providing services for homeless veterans to direct the Secretary of Veterans Affairs (VA) to annually increase the rate of such payment to reflect anticipated changes in the cost of furnishing services, and to take into account the cost of providing services in a particular geographic area.
